cta.title: Let's Begin Your Journey

hero.subtitle: Classical Hatha Yoga & Retreats
hero.title: Transform Yourself Through Classical Hatha Yoga Structured by Sadhguru

paragraph1.title: An Ancient Science
paragraph1.text: Classical Hatha Yoga is a complete science preserved in its purest form. It is a profound process of aligning body, mind and energy towards a higher potential, transmitted with precision through the centuries.

paragraph2.title: Sadhguru's Teaching
paragraph2.text: These ancestral practices have been structured and transmitted by Sadhguru, contemporary spiritual master and founder of Isha Foundation, making them accessible while preserving their authenticity and transformational power.

paragraph3.title: My Approach
paragraph3.text: I share these teachings with gratitude and humility, offering a framework faithful to this ancient tradition so that everyone can experience it directly and discover their own path to inner balance.

hero.cta2: Join us on the mat (group classes)

regularClasses.subtitle: Group Classes
regularClasses.title: Join Us on the Mat
regularClasses.autonomy: These programs, structured by Sadhguru, are designed to make each participant autonomous: upon completion of each program, practices can be continued independently at home, with full autonomy.

upaYoga.title: Upa Yoga
upaYoga.subtitle: Foundation yoga for body, energy and vitality
upaYoga.description: Upa Yoga is a simple yet powerful set of 10 practices that activate joints, muscles and the energy system, bringing ease and stability to the entire body.

benefits.0: Helps release physical tension and fatigue
benefits.2: Restores vitality and mobility to the body after periods of inactivity

upaYoga.attendance: Attendance at all sessions is mandatory

suryaKriya.title: Surya Kriya
suryaKriya.subtitle: Complete yogic practice for vitality and inner clarity
suryaKriya.description: Surya Kriya is a complete 21-step yogic practice from an ancient tradition, designed to support health and inner wellbeing.

benefits.0: Develops mental clarity and concentration capacity
benefits.1: Supports body vitality and hormonal balance
benefits.2: Harmonizes body, mind and energy system
benefits.3: Fosters a meditative state and supports the experience of inner calm and joy

suryaKriya.attendance: Attendance at all sessions is mandatory

suryaShakti.title: Surya Shakti
suryaShakti.subtitle: Dynamic practice for strength, endurance and energy
suryaShakti.description: Surya Shakti is a practice designed to activate and strengthen the body's energy. This 18-step process helps strengthen the ligaments that hold the skeletal and muscular structure.

benefits.0: Improves physical fitness and overall wellbeing
benefits.3: Prepares the body to access higher levels of energy

suryaShakti.attendance: Attendance at all sessions is mandatory

angamardana.title: Angamardana
angamardana.subtitle: Dynamic practice for strength, mobility and fitness
angamardana.description: Angamardana is a series of 31 dynamic yogic processes designed to revitalize the body and develop optimal physical fitness. The term Angamardana means gaining complete mastery of limbs, organs and different body parts. This practice requires no fitness equipment.

benefits.0: Strengthens the spine as well as skeletal and muscular systems
benefits.1: Develops physical strength, fitness and tenacity
benefits.2: Revitalizes the body, bringing a sense of lightness and freedom in movement
benefits.3: Prepares the body for Hatha Yoga practice
benefits.4: Revitalizes the entire body, including muscles, blood circulation as well as skeletal and nervous systems

angamardana.attendance: Attendance at all sessions is mandatory

yogasanas.title: Yogasanas
yogasanas.subtitle: Yoga postures for inner alignment and harmony
yogasanas.description: Yogasanas are a set of powerful postures to elevate consciousness and manipulate the body's energies. Yogasanas are a way to align the inner system and adjust it to celestial geometry, to resonate with existence.

benefits.0: Support in relieving certain chronic illnesses
benefits.1: Evolution of body and mind towards higher potential
benefits.2: Stabilization of body, mind and energy system

yogasanas.attendance: Attendance at all sessions is mandatory

trialClass.title: Free Trial Class
trialClass.description: New to yoga? Come try your first class for free, no commitment.

otherPrograms.subtitle: Other Programs
otherPrograms.title: For Health and Wellbeing
otherPrograms.intro: Guided pathways combining yoga, pranayama, meditation and traditional chants, designed to support your health and wellbeing holistically.
otherPrograms.disclaimer: These programs are inspired by Sadhguru's guidance and the Isha yogic tradition, but are delivered independently by Hajar Habi.
otherPrograms.medicalWarning: These programs do not substitute medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. They provide complementary support for overall wellbeing.

health.title: Yoga for Health
health.intro: These yoga for health programs offer adapted and personalized support for your wellbeing in relation to various health concerns, with a complementary approach that respects your medical journey.

whatToExpect.title: What these programs look like
items: Adapted yoga sessions (mobility, gentle strengthening, relaxation)
Home practice guidance (short and accessible routines)

immunity.title: Immunity & support for demanding health journeys
items: Cancer – adjuvant support (wellbeing, stress management, energy, sleep)

health.ctaSubtext: A conversation to understand your needs and suggest an adapted framework.
health.disclaimer: These programs are part of a holistic wellbeing approach and do not replace medical advice or treatment.

wellbeing.title: Yoga for Wellbeing
wellbeing.intro: These yoga for wellbeing programs are designed to support your overall balance, vitality and personal fulfillment through yogic practices adapted to your needs and aspirations.
wellbeing.note: The programs presented below are general orientations. Each journey is adjusted based on your needs, priorities and capacities during an initial consultation.

whatToExpect.title: What these programs look like
items: Gentle and balancing yoga practices (grounding, opening, relaxation)
Pranayama adapted to the nervous system (calm, vitality)

wellbeing.ctaSubtext: An initial conversation to guide you, without commitment.
wellbeing.durationNote: Program duration can vary from a few hours to several weeks. Modalities, rhythm and practices are always discussed during an initial consultation, then adjusted based on individual needs, priorities and capacities.

atlas.title: Yoga & Meditation Retreat in the Atlas
atlas.description: Total immersion in traditional yogic practice in the heart of the Atlas Mountains. Yoga, meditation, contemplative hiking and local cuisine.

silence.title: Silence & Contemplation Retreat
silence.description: A silent retreat by the Atlantic Ocean. Deep meditation, yogic practices, and contemplation time facing the sea.

leadership.title: Conscious Leadership Workshop
leadership.description: An intensive workshop to develop your authentic leadership, combining contemplative practices and organizational facilitation tools.

balance.title: Balance & Healthy Boundaries Workshop
balance.description: A practical workshop to create sustainable work-life balance. Learn to set healthy boundaries without guilt and prevent burnout.

philosophy.title: Yoga & Philosophy Training
philosophy.description: In-depth training in traditional yoga fundamentals: asanas, pranayama, meditation and yogic philosophy.

lineage.subtitle: Lineage & Tradition
lineage.title: In the Lineage of Sadhguru
lineage.intro: All yoga teachings offered are rooted in the Classical Hatha Yoga tradition, transmitted by Sadhguru through Isha Foundation. An ancient lineage preserved in its purity and authenticity.

sadhguru.title: Sadhguru
sadhguru.description: Yogi, mystic and visionary, Sadhguru has dedicated his life to making yoga accessible to all in its purest form. His teacher training program is globally recognized for its authenticity and rigor.

training.title: Isha Certified Training
training.description: Intensive 21-week residential training at the Isha Yoga Center in India, under Sadhguru's direct guidance.

hours.title: 1750+ Hours of Training
hours.description: A complete immersion in yogic practices: asanas, pranayama, kriyas, meditation and yogic philosophy.

global.title: Global Community
global.description: Isha Foundation is present in over 150 countries, with millions of practitioners benefiting from these transformative teachings.

philosophy.subtitle: My Philosophy
philosophy.title: Yoga as a Path of Transformation
philosophy.intro: For me, yoga is much more than a physical practice. It's a path of deep transformation that touches all aspects of our being - body, mind, heart and spirit.

tradition.title: Authentic Tradition
tradition.description: Trained in the traditional lineage of Hatha Yoga, I teach practices in their authentic form, respectful of ancestral wisdom.

inclusive.title: Inclusive Approach
inclusive.description: Yoga is for all bodies and all ages. I adapt the practice to each person with kindness and respect.

beyond.title: Beyond the Physical
beyond.description: The yoga I teach goes beyond postures. We explore breathing, meditation and yogic philosophy.

smallGroups.title: Small Groups
smallGroups.description: I teach in small groups (max 12 people) to maintain quality of teaching and individual attention.

custom.subtitle: Personalized Program
custom.title: Let's Create Your Experience Together
custom.description: Would you like a custom program for your group, your team or a special occasion? We design unique experiences adapted to your needs.

form.subtitle: Contact Form
form.title: Send Me a Message
form.description: Fill out this form and I will respond within 48 hours.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your project, your needs, your questions...
form.consent: I agree that my personal data may be used to contact me regarding my request. It will never be shared with third parties.
form.responseTime: You will receive a response within 48 hours maximum.

0.question: Do you offer online sessions?
0.answer: Yes! Most of my services are available online via Zoom or in-person in Casablanca. Retreats take place in Morocco in inspiring locations.

1.question: How long does support last?
1.answer: It depends on your needs. Coaching can be one-off (1-2 sessions) or spread over 3-6 months. We discuss this together during the discovery session to find what works best for you.

2.question: Do I need yoga experience to join classes?
2.answer: Not at all! My classes are open to all levels, from complete beginners to experienced practitioners. I even offer a free trial class for those new to yoga.

3.question: How does the first discovery session work?
3.answer: It's a complimentary 30-minute conversation (online or in-person) to get to know each other, understand your needs and see if we're aligned to work together. No pressure, just an honest conversation.

hero.subtitle: Journey & Expertise
hero.title: A Rare Alliance at the Service of Your Transformation
hero.description: Discover the journey that enables me to support organizations and individuals with a unique approach, combining professional excellence and proven wellbeing technologies.

story.subtitle: My Journey
story.title: From Business to Yoga: A Coherent Path
story.paragraph2: I am a graduate of the National School of Business and Management of Settat (2007), a Professional Coach certified by Transformance Pro, under the supervision of Vincent Lenhardt, in collaboration with UM6P – Africa Business School (2024), and a Classical Hatha Yoga Teacher certified by Sadhguru Gurukulam (2025).
story.paragraph3: For nearly twenty years, I have supported companies in Morocco and internationally in their transformation projects as a skills development expert and then as an HR Manager in consulting firms, Moroccan and international companies.
story.paragraph4: Trained in coaching individuals, teams and organizations, I now support you in transformation contexts whether cultural, operational or organizational, whether you are a leader or change agent, to develop clarity, discernment and the ability to act with precision, even in complex and demanding environments.
story.paragraph5: I love designing customized and innovative support programs, which leave room for experimentation, collective intelligence and the emergence of new possibilities for collaboration and implementation.
story.paragraph6: My practice of Classical Hatha Yoga, nurtured by an extended immersion in an ashram in India, complements the depth of my interventions. It offers powerful, accessible and scientifically validated yogic tools to develop awareness, vitality and inner balance.

experience.subtitle: Professional Experience
experience.title: 20 Years in Organizational Transformation
experience.description: Two decades supporting international organizations through their strategic and cultural transformations. From diagnosis to implementation, including change management and leadership development.

transformation.title: Organizational Transformation
transformation.description: Strategic transformation, culture change, organizational design

strategy.title: Strategy & Facilitation
strategy.description: Strategic planning, executive seminars, co-creative facilitation

hr.title: People & Leadership
hr.description: Leadership development, talent management, organizational coaching

philosophy.subtitle: My Philosophy
philosophy.title: Why This Unique Alliance
philosophy.paragraph1: The professional world and the inner world are not separate. Transforming one without the other creates imbalance. Transforming them together creates magic.
philosophy.paragraph2: My approach is based on the conviction that professional excellence and well-being are not opposites. They nourish each other when you know how to create the right conditions.
philosophy.paragraph3: Contemplative practices don't make you less performant. They make you more present, more lucid, more creative, more resilient. And therefore, paradoxically, more effective.
philosophy.paragraph4: This is the alliance I've embodied in my own life. And this is the alliance I support in my clients - whether they are organizations or individuals.

cta.title: Let's Work Together
cta.description: Whether you're an organization or an individual, let's explore how my expertise can serve your transformation.
